@graph.name: Workflow RO-Crate profile
@graph.description:
Workflow RO-Crates are a specialization of RO-Crate for packaging an executable workflow with all necessary documentation. It is aligned with, and intends to strictly extend, the more general Bioschemas ComputationalWorkflow profile.

WorkflowHub uses Workflow RO Crates as an exchange format for users to upload a packaged workflow.
